resource.text:
# aster _a local, extensible, open source AI agent that automates engineering tasks_

aster is your on-machine AI agent, capable of automating complex development tasks from start to finish. More than just code suggestions, aster can build entire projects from scratch, write and execute code, debug failures, orchestrate workflows, and interact with external APIs - _autonomously_. Whether you're prototyping an idea, refining existing code, or managing intricate engineering pipelines, aster adapts to your workflow and executes tasks with precision. Designed for maximum flexibility, aster works with any LLM and supports multi-model configuration to optimize performance and cost, seamlessly integrates with MCP servers, and is available as both a desktop app as well as CLI - making it the ultimate AI assistant for developers who want to move faster and focus on innovation. [![Watch the video](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/ddc71240-3928-41b5-8210-626dfb28af7a)](https://youtu.be/D-DpDunrbpo) # Quick Links - [Quickstart](https://astercloud.github.io/aster-rust/docs/quickstart) - [Installation](https://astercloud.github.io/aster-rust/docs/getting-started/installation) - [Tutorials](https://astercloud.github.io/aster-rust/docs/category/tutorials) - [Documentation](https://astercloud.github.io/aster-rust/docs/category/getting-started) # a little aster humor ðŸ¦¢ > Why did the developer choose aster as their AI agent? > > Because it always helps them "migrate" their code to production! ðŸš€ # aster around with us - [Discord](https://discord.gg/block-opensource) - [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@aster-oss) - [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/aster-oss) - [Twitter/X](https://x.com/aster_oss) - [Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/opensource.block.xyz) - [Nostr](https://njump.me/opensource@block.xyz)
